newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Caracas stocks close lower amid strike concerns.
newsitem.headline: Caracas stocks close lower amid strike concerns.

text.p: Caracas stocks closed lower on Tuesday in moderate trade as international investors gave Venezuela a wide berth amid concerns about growing labor strife, traders said.
"Strike threats, labor protests, marches ... all of these are keeping investors away," Multinvest broker Mario Simosa said.

The leading 19-share index slipped 0.77 percent to end at 6,209.23 points, as 39 million shares worth 3.2 billion bolivars ($6.7 million) changed hands, according to preliminary figures from the exchange.
